description: Model name used for the run (for example resnet50).
Weight source (for example dtd or imagenet).
Epoch index for this row in the run history.
Validation F1 score for the epoch.
Training loss logged for the epoch.
Learning rate used after unfreezing layers.
Number of epochs with backbone frozen.
Total planned epochs for the run.
Source ground-truth CSV path used for the run.
Comma-separated fields inferred from run name when missing in config.
